description: Modify ball attributes. This is a synonym for the ball attribute command. See ball attribute for complete list of available keywords and modifiers.

examples.description: Set density for balls in group (same as ball attribute)
Set velocity for all balls (same as ball attribute)
Reset displacement (same as ball attribute with multiply modifier)

python_sdk_alternative.workaround: Same as ball attribute: use Ball.set_*() methods - requires iteration
